references: D. H. Lehmer, A cotangent analogue of continued fractions, Duke Math. J., 4 (1935), 323-340.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9
D. H. Lehmer, A cotangent analogue of continued fractions, Duke Math. J., 4 (1935), 323-340. [Annotated scanned copy]
Index entries for sequences related to the number Pi
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 10000); bn=vector(10); bn[1]=Pi; for(n=2, 10, bn[n]=(bn[n-1]*floor(bn[n-1]) + 1)/(bn[n-1] - floor(bn[n-1]))); for (n=1, 10, write("b002667.txt", n-1, " ", floor(bn[n]))); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 04 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
